info.author: Shula Amokshim
classifiers: Operating System :: Microsoft :: Windows :: Windows NT/2000
info.description:
Create catalog image(s) of all TrueType / OpenType ttf fonts files found in a
directory.

The user can select text sample, font size, and bg/fg colors.

Font-Sampler works both as a GUI program and from the command line.

Tested on Windows XP, but designed to work on Linux, and should run on Mac as well.
info.name: Font-Sampler
info.html_description:
Create catalog image(s) of all TrueType / OpenType ttf fonts files found in a directory.

The user can select text sample, font size, and bg/fg colors.

Font-Sampler works both as a GUI program and from the command line.

Tested on Windows XP, but designed to work on Linux, and should run on Mac as well.
